ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT( ISBLANK( loan__ACH_Next_Debit_Date__c )) && NOT( ISBLANK( loan__OT_ACH_Debit_Date__c )) && (loan__ACH_Next_Debit_Date__c == loan__OT_ACH_Debit_Date__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: System Limitation - You cannot set up a One Time ACH and Recurring ACH transaction on the same day.
